title: Marlink to offer Starlink to maritime and enterprise customers
summary: Maritime connectivity specialist Marlink will offer Starlink to its customers as SpaceX’s broadband service turns to partners to expand beyond the consumer market.

title: NASA studying issue with JWST instrument
summary: One part of an instrument on the James Webb Space Telescope is out of service temporarily, although project officials are confident it will not be a long-term problem.

title: DoD to end procurements of geosynchronous missile-warning satellites
summary: The Pentagon plans to end procurements of very large geosynchronous Earth orbit (GEO) infrared satellites and transition to a proliferated architecture in lower orbits

title: SpaceX’s first orbital Starship launch “highly likely” in November, says Elon Musk
summary: CEO Elon Musk says that it’s “highly likely” SpaceX will be ready to attempt its first orbital Starship launch in November 2022,...

title: NASA astronaut launches to space station aboard Russian rocket
summary: Despite severely strained U.S.-Russian foreign relations, an American astronaut joined two Russian cosmonauts aboard a Soyuz spacecraft in Kazakhstan and rocketed into orbit Wednesday on a two-orbit flight to the International Space Station.
